title: Keep Android Open
summary:
In August 2025, Google announced a new policy set to begin next year that will require all Android developers to register with Google to develop apps for the platform. This registration process will involve paying a fee, agreeing to Google's terms and conditions, providing government identification, uploading proof of the app's signing key, and listing all application identifiers.

This policy has sparked considerable opposition, with concerns raised about its impact on independent developers, open-source app stores like F-Droid, and the overall freedom of the Android ecosystem. Critics argue that the new requirements will create barriers to entry, stifle innovation, and give Google excessive control over app distribution.

The "Keep Android Open" initiative has emerged to oppose the enactment of this policy. Actions being promoted include signing an open letter to Google, contacting relevant regulatory bodies (e.g., EU Competition Policy, US Department of Justice Antitrust, UK Competition & Markets Authority) in various countries, providing feedback to Google through their Android developer verification survey, and raising awareness on social media. The initiative also encourages collaborative efforts to gather and disseminate more information about the policy and its potential consequences. The provided text includes a comprehensive list of resources including articles, videos, and forum discussions, detailing the negative impacts and potential regulatory challenges associated with the new rules.
chinese_title: 保持安卓开放
chinese_summary:
2025年8月，谷歌宣布一项将于明年开始实施的新政策，该政策将要求所有安卓开发者向谷歌注册才能为该平台开发应用。 注册过程将包括支付费用、同意谷歌的条款和条件、提供政府身份证明、上传应用签名密钥的证明以及列出所有应用标识符。

这项政策引发了相当大的反对，人们对其对独立开发者、F-Droid等开源应用商店以及安卓生态系统的整体自由的影响表示担忧。 批评者认为，新的要求将设置准入壁垒，扼杀创新，并使谷歌过度控制应用分发。

“保持安卓开放”倡议应运而生，旨在反对这项政策的实施。 目前推广的行动包括签署致谷歌的公开信、联系各国的相关监管机构（例如，欧盟竞争政策、美国司法部反垄断部门、英国竞争与市场管理局）、通过谷歌的安卓开发者验证调查提供反馈，以及在社交媒体上提高人们的意识。 该倡议还鼓励合作，以收集和传播更多关于该政策及其潜在后果的信息。 提供的信息包括一份全面的资源清单，其中包括文章、视频和论坛讨论，详细说明了新规则的负面影响和潜在的监管挑战。

title: Cursor Composer: Building a fast frontier model with RL
summary:
Cursor has developed "Composer," a new intelligent agent model designed for speed and intelligence in software engineering. It outperforms similar models in coding tasks, achieving four times faster generation speeds in internal benchmarks. This was achieved by training Composer on a large codebase to handle real-world software engineering tasks, utilizing production-grade search and editing tools.

Composer is a Mixture of Experts (MoE) language model optimized for software engineering through reinforcement learning (RL) in diverse development environments. It learns to efficiently solve problems by producing code modifications, plans, or information using tools like file editing, terminal commands, and code base semantic searches.

Cursor developed a realistic benchmark, Cursor Bench, based on actual agent requests from their engineers to measure progress. The benchmark assesses correctness and adherence to existing code abstractions and software engineering practices. RL is used to specifically optimize the model for efficient software engineering.

The model is trained to make efficient tool selections and maximize parallel processing. It also learns to avoid unnecessary responses and unfounded statements. Furthermore, it spontaneously acquires abilities such as complex searching, fixing linter errors, and writing unit tests during RL training.

Cursor built a custom training infrastructure using PyTorch and Ray, combining MXFP8 MoE kernels with expert and data parallelism to train the model efficiently on thousands of NVIDIA GPUs with low communication overhead. This allows for faster inference without post-training quantization. The training environment leverages Cursor's existing Background Agents infrastructure to run hundreds of thousands of isolated sandboxed coding environments in the cloud.

The goal is to create an intelligent agent that Cursor's own engineers can rely on daily. Early adoption within Cursor has proven valuable, and they hope to extend that value to their users.
chinese_title: 光标作曲家：用强化学习构建快速前沿模型
chinese_summary:
Cursor开发了“Composer”，一款专为软件工程的速度和智能而设计的新型智能代理模型。在内部基准测试中，它在编码任务上的表现优于同类模型，生成速度快四倍。这归功于Composer在大型代码库上进行训练，以处理实际的软件工程任务，并利用生产级别的搜索和编辑工具。

Composer是一个混合专家（MoE）语言模型，通过强化学习（RL）在不同的开发环境中进行优化，专用于软件工程。它通过使用文件编辑、终端命令和代码库语义搜索等工具生成代码修改、计划或信息来高效地解决问题。

Cursor开发了一个基于其工程师的实际代理请求的真实基准测试Cursor Bench，以衡量进展。该基准测试评估了正确性以及对现有代码抽象和软件工程实践的遵守情况。强化学习（RL）专门用于优化模型，以提高软件工程效率。

该模型经过训练，可以进行高效的工具选择并最大化并行处理。它还学会避免不必要的响应和没有根据的陈述。此外，它还在强化学习（RL）训练期间自发地获得诸如复杂搜索、修复linter错误和编写单元测试等能力。

Cursor使用PyTorch和Ray构建了一个自定义的训练基础设施，将MXFP8 MoE内核与专家和数据并行性相结合，以在数千个NVIDIA GPU上高效地训练模型，且通信开销低。这允许更快的推理，无需训练后量化。训练环境利用Cursor现有的Background Agents基础设施，在云中运行数十万个隔离的沙盒编码环境。

目标是创建一个Cursor自己的工程师可以每天依赖的智能代理。在Cursor内部的早期采用已被证明是有价值的，他们希望将该价值扩展到他们的用户。

title: Tailscale Peer Relays
summary:
Tailscale has announced the public beta release of Tailscale Peer Relays, a customer-managed alternative to Tailscale's DERP servers for relaying network traffic within a tailnet. Unlike DERP, which prioritizes reliability and NAT traversal, Peer Relays are designed for high-performance connectivity, rivaling direct connections in speed and efficiency.

Peer Relays address the limitations of DERP in environments where throughput is critical, such as cloud infrastructure behind strict firewalls or NAT gateways. They enable customers to deploy relay nodes close to resources, using UDP for lower latency. They are also integrated directly into the Tailscale client, simplifying deployment.

Administrators enable Peer Relays with a simple CLI command, configuring a single UDP port accessible to both connecting nodes. Tailscale still prioritizes direct connections, falling back to Peer Relays and then DERP. This enables a flexible networking topology while maintaining end-to-end encryption through WireGuard.

Benefits include high-throughput connections through cloud NATs, predictable access paths through network firewalls, reduced reliance on DERP, and easier access to locked-down customer networks. Tailscale's Peer Relays aim to offer the best performance and flexibility for customers who need to scale Tailscale usage within various network environments. Tailscale offers two peer relays for free on all plans.
chinese_title: Tailscale 对等节点中继
chinese_summary:
Tailscale 发布 Tailscale Peer Relays 公开测试版，这是客户管理的替代方案，用于替代 Tailscale 的 DERP 服务器，以便在 tailnet 内中继网络流量。与优先考虑可靠性和 NAT 穿透的 DERP 不同，Peer Relays 专为高性能连接而设计，在速度和效率上可与直接连接相媲美。

Peer Relays 解决了 DERP 在吞吐量至关重要的环境中的局限性，例如位于严格防火墙或 NAT 网关之后的云基础设施。它们使客户能够部署靠近资源的转发节点，并使用 UDP 来降低延迟。它们还直接集成到 Tailscale 客户端中，从而简化了部署。

管理员可以使用简单的 CLI 命令启用 Peer Relays，配置一个可供连接节点访问的 UDP 端口。Tailscale 仍然优先考虑直接连接，然后回退到 Peer Relays，再回退到 DERP。这实现了一种灵活的网络拓扑，同时通过 WireGuard 保持端到端加密。

其优势包括通过云 NAT 的高吞吐量连接、通过网络防火墙的可预测访问路径、减少对 DERP 的依赖以及更轻松地访问锁定客户网络。Tailscale 的 Peer Relays 旨在为需要在各种网络环境中扩展 Tailscale 使用量的客户提供最佳性能和灵活性。Tailscale 在所有计划中免费提供两个 peer relays。

title: I made a 10¢ MCU Talk
summary:
This blog post details the author's successful attempt to make a $0.10 microcontroller (MCU), specifically the CH32V003, "talk" using its limited 16KB of flash memory. The author achieved this through two primary methods: compressed audio playback and LPC speech synthesis.

First, the author explores playing a 6-second audio clip using the MCU's PWM output as a rudimentary DAC. Due to the memory limitations, aggressive audio compression was necessary. The author ultimately chose 2-bit ADPCM, achieving a 4:1 compression ratio and reducing the audio clip to under 12KB, fitting within the flash memory. A custom tool was created to convert WAV files to this format.

Second, for longer phrases and speech, the author implemented LPC (Linear Predictive Coding) speech synthesis using the Talkie library, based on the Texas Instruments TMS5220/5100 architecture (think Speak & Spell). LPC allows for compact storage of speech data by modeling the human voice. A streamlined online tool was created to convert recordings of the author's voice into LPC data for playback.

The author highlights the impressive capabilities of even these ultra-cheap MCUs, demonstrating that complex audio functionalities like compressed audio and speech synthesis can be achieved within severely constrained memory environments. The code for the project is available on GitHub, and a video demo showcases the results.
chinese_title: 我做了一个十分钱的MCU演讲
chinese_summary:
作者成功使用16KB闪存使0.1美元的单片机(MCU)，特别是CH32V003，“说话”的尝试。他主要通过两种方法实现了这一点：压缩音频播放和LPC语音合成。

首先，作者探索了使用MCU的PWM输出作为简易DAC播放一段6秒的音频片段。由于内存限制，必须进行激进的音频压缩。作者最终选择了2-bit ADPCM，实现了4:1的压缩比，并将音频片段缩小到12KB以下，使其能够装入闪存。为此，作者还创建了一个自定义工具，用于将WAV文件转换为这种格式。

其次，对于更长的短语和语音，作者基于德州仪器TMS5220/5100架构（想想Speak & Spell），使用Talkie库实现了LPC（线性预测编码）语音合成。LPC通过对人声建模，可以紧凑地存储语音数据。作者还创建了一个简化的在线工具，用于将作者本人的录音转换为LPC数据进行播放。

作者强调了即使是这些超低成本MCU的强大功能，证明了在受到严重限制的内存环境中也可以实现诸如压缩音频和语音合成等复杂的音频功能。该项目的代码已在GitHub上提供，并且有一个视频演示展示了结果。

title: Floss Before Brushing
summary:
This article challenges the commonly held belief that brushing teeth should precede flossing. The author recounts a conversation with a dental hygienist who advised switching the order to floss first, followed by brushing. Initially skeptical, the author came to understand the rationale behind this recommendation.

Flossing before brushing loosens and removes food particles and plaque from between the teeth, areas a toothbrush can't effectively reach. This pre-emptive cleaning then allows the fluoride in toothpaste to access and protect more tooth surfaces during brushing. The author found this logic compelling and points to supporting studies.

The article highlights three key takeaways: firstly, habits can always be improved, even long-standing ones. Secondly, the act of flossing itself is paramount, regardless of the order, so making flossing a regular habit is crucial. And finally, if flossing is already a habit, switching to flossing before brushing provides an optimal benefit for dental hygiene.
chinese_title: 刷牙前用牙线
chinese_summary:
本文挑战了一种普遍的观念，即刷牙应该先于用牙线。作者叙述了与一位牙科保健师的对话，后者建议将顺序改为先用牙线，然后刷牙。起初作者对此持怀疑态度，但后来逐渐理解了这一建议背后的原理。

先用牙线可以松动并清除牙齿之间的食物残渣和牙菌斑，这些区域是牙刷无法有效触及的。这种预防性的清洁使得牙膏中的氟化物在刷牙时能够接触并保护更多的牙齿表面。作者发现这个逻辑令人信服，并指出了支持性的研究。

本文强调了三个关键要点：首先，习惯总是可以改进的，即使是长期存在的习惯。其次，使用牙线的行为本身至关重要，无论顺序如何，因此养成定期使用牙线的习惯至关重要。最后，如果使用牙线已经成为一种习惯，那么改为先用牙线再刷牙可以为口腔卫生带来最佳益处。

title: Does brand advertising work? Upwave (YC S12) is hiring engineers to answer that
summary:
Upwave, a brand outcomes measurement platform backed by Y Combinator and other leading investors, is hiring a Senior Software Engineer to build and scale its AI-driven platform. The platform helps leading advertisers measure and optimize their brand campaigns across various channels, processing billions of ad impressions to deliver insights that inform multi-million dollar marketing decisions.

The Senior Software Engineer will be a full-stack problem solver with a backend focus, contributing to the development of APIs, data pipelines, and systems that power the platform. Key responsibilities include integrating LLMs for AI-powered customer experiences, designing scalable backend systems, building and operating data pipelines at scale, and improving system reliability and performance.

The ideal candidate has 5+ years of experience, is comfortable across the full stack, and understands modern UI frameworks, API architectures, databases, and cloud platforms. Experience with modern AI-powered development tools and structured software development practices is highly valued. Bonus points for experience with Java/Kotlin/Groovy, MySQL/DynamoDB/Presto, AWS/Kubernetes/Terraform, and AdTech/MarTech.

Upwave offers a remote-first, engineering-first environment with a modern tech stack. The company emphasizes autonomy, ownership, and a collaborative culture. The role offers a base salary range of $150,000 - $175,000 + bonus + equity + benefits.
chinese_title: 品牌广告有效吗？Upwave (YC S12) 正在招聘工程师来解答这个问题。
chinese_summary:
Upwave诚聘高级软件工程师，构建并扩展其人工智能驱动平台。Upwave是一家品牌效果衡量平台，获得Y Combinator和其他领先投资者的支持。该平台帮助领先广告商衡量和优化其跨渠道的品牌活动，处理数十亿次的广告展示，以提供洞察力，为数百万美元的营销决策提供信息。

高级软件工程师将是一位具备后端经验的全栈问题解决者，负责开发API、数据管道和驱动平台的系统。主要职责包括集成LLM以实现人工智能驱动的客户体验，设计可扩展的后端系统，构建和运营大规模数据管道，并提高系统的可靠性和性能。

理想的候选人应具有5年以上经验，熟悉全栈技术，并了解现代UI框架、API架构、数据库和云平台。拥有现代人工智能驱动的开发工具和结构化软件开发实践经验者优先考虑。具备Java/Kotlin/Groovy、MySQL/DynamoDB/Presto、AWS/Kubernetes/Terraform以及广告技术/营销技术经验者优先。

Upwave提供远程优先、工程师优先的环境，并采用现代技术栈。公司强调自主性、所有权和协作文化。该职位提供15万美元至17.5万美元的基本工资范围+奖金+股权+福利。

title: Beyond RaspberryPi: What are all the other SoC vendors up to *summarised*
summary:
Here's a summary of the State of Embedded: Q4 2025 Overview article:

The ARM-based SBC market continues to thrive, presenting strong competition to x86 platforms. Key developments include NVIDIA's release of the DGX Spark powered by the GB10 Grace Blackwell Superchip, although Jetson support was dropped. Qualcomm made significant strides with the launch of the Snapdragon Oryon X2, hitting 5GHz. Radxa introduced the Dragon Q6A SBC with mainline support at an affordable price, and Qualcomm acquired Arduino, introducing SBCs to that ecosystem with the Arduino UNO Q.

Rockchip unveiled roadmaps for the RK3688 and RK3668 SoCs, featuring next-gen Arm Mali Magni GPUs and impressive performance specs. Kernel updates are continuing while active PanVK Vulkan development is being done for the Mali G610. MediaTek focused on software support for its Genio and Kompanio lines, with Libre Computer and Radxa working on new boards. The Dimensity 9500 flagship mobile SoC also made an appearance reaching great Geekbench results.

CIX saw increased product availability with the Radxa Orion-O6N and OrangePi 6 Plus, alongside progress on mainline device-tree support. Raspberry Pi introduced the 500+ desktop computer. Texas Instruments maintained its focus on automotive applications, while Imagination Technologies made driver updates. DENX, known for U-Boot, is winding down operations. Synaptics is releasing a new SBC with Toradex, featuring the Astra SL1680 SoC. AI NPUs are getting more affordable and accessible.
chinese_title: 树莓派之外：其他SoC厂商在做什么 *概要*
chinese_summary:
嵌入式状态：2025年第四季度概览文章摘要：

基于ARM的SBC市场持续繁荣，对x86平台构成强劲竞争。主要进展包括英伟达发布了由GB10 Grace Blackwell Superchip驱动的DGX Spark，但停止了对Jetson的支持。高通凭借Snapdragon Oryon X2的发布取得了显著进展，频率达到5GHz。瑞莎推出了具有主线支持且价格合理的Dragon Q6A SBC，高通收购了Arduino，将SBC引入了Arduino生态系统，推出了Arduino UNO Q。

瑞芯微公布了RK3688和RK3668 SoC的路线图，其特点是下一代Arm Mali Magni GPU和令人印象深刻的性能规格。内核更新持续进行，同时正在为Mali G610积极进行PanVK Vulkan开发。联发科专注于其Genio和Kompanio系列的软件支持，Libre Computer和瑞莎正在开发新的板卡。Dimensity 9500旗舰移动SoC也亮相，获得了出色的Geekbench结果。

CIX的产品可用性有所提高，Radxa Orion-O6N和OrangePi 6 Plus相继上市，同时主线设备树支持方面也取得了进展。树莓派推出了500+桌面电脑。德州仪器继续专注于汽车应用，而Imagination Technologies则进行了驱动程序更新。以U-Boot闻名的DENX正在逐步结束运营。新思科技将与Toradex合作发布一款新的SBC，采用Astra SL1680 SoC。AI NPU正变得越来越经济实惠和容易获得。

title: Collins Aerospace: Sending text messages to the cockpit with test:test
summary:
A security vulnerability was discovered in Collins Aerospace's ARINC OpCenter Message Browser, a system used to send text messages to aircraft cockpits. Researchers were able to log in using the easily guessable credentials "test:test" and gain access as U.S. Navy Fleet Logistics Support Wing. This access allowed them to view sent messages and, critically, the capability to send new text messages to cockpits. The researchers, for ethical reasons, refrained from sending any messages.

The vulnerability was reported to RTX Corporation (Collins Aerospace's parent company) but reportedly received no response. Subsequently, the vulnerable account was disabled. The Department of Defense Cyber Crime Center was also informed about the vulnerability on September 21, 2025. The easily compromised login credentials represent a significant security risk, potentially allowing unauthorized parties to send misleading or disruptive messages to aircraft pilots.
chinese_title: 柯林斯宇航：向驾驶舱发送文本消息，测试：测试
chinese_summary:
柯林斯宇航ARINC OpCenter消息浏览器发现安全漏洞。该系统用于向飞机驾驶舱发送文本消息。研究人员能够使用容易猜测的凭据“test:test”登录，并获得美国海军舰队后勤支援机翼的访问权限。此访问权限允许他们查看已发送的消息，并且关键的是，能够向驾驶舱发送新的文本消息。出于道德原因，研究人员没有发送任何消息。

该漏洞已报告给RTX公司（柯林斯宇航的母公司），但据报道未收到任何回应。随后，该存在漏洞的帐户被禁用。国防部网络犯罪中心也于2025年9月21日获悉了该漏洞。 这种容易被攻破的登录凭据代表着重大的安全风险，可能会允许未经授权的方发送具有误导性或破坏性的消息给飞机飞行员。

title: Eye prosthesis is the first to restore sight lost to macular degeneration
summary:
A new eye prosthesis, PRIMA, has shown promise in restoring functional vision to individuals with advanced age-related macular degeneration (geographic atrophy), a leading cause of irreversible blindness. Developed at Stanford Medicine, the device consists of a wireless chip implanted in the eye and high-tech glasses. The glasses capture images and project them as infrared light onto the chip, which converts them into electrical stimulation, replacing the function of damaged photoreceptors.

In a clinical trial, 27 out of 32 participants regained the ability to read within a year of receiving the implant. With digital enhancements like zoom and contrast adjustments, some achieved acuity equivalent to 20/42 vision. Unlike previous prosthetic devices that only offered light sensitivity, PRIMA provides form vision, allowing patients to perceive shapes and patterns.

The device utilizes the patient's remaining peripheral vision in conjunction with the prosthetic central vision. The chip is photovoltaic, operating wirelessly and implanted under the retina. While the current version provides black-and-white vision, future software updates will enable grayscale for improved face recognition. Researchers are also developing higher-resolution chips with smaller pixels for potentially achieving 20/80 vision, with the possibility of near 20/20 with electronic zoom. Although some participants experienced side effects, they were generally not life-threatening and resolved quickly.
chinese_title: 眼部义眼首次用于恢复黄斑变性导致的视力丧失
chinese_summary:
新型眼部假体PRIMA有望恢复晚期年龄相关性黄斑变性（地图样萎缩）患者的功能性视力，该疾病是导致不可逆失明的主要原因之一。该设备由斯坦福大学医学院开发，由植入眼部的无线芯片和高科技眼镜组成。眼镜捕捉图像并将它们以红外光的形式投射到芯片上，芯片将它们转换为电刺激，从而取代受损感光细胞的功能。

在一项临床试验中，32名参与者中有27名在接受植入后一年内恢复了阅读能力。通过缩放和对比度调整等数字增强功能，一些人达到了相当于20/42的视力敏锐度。与之前仅提供光敏感度的假体设备不同，PRIMA提供形态视觉，使患者能够感知形状和图案。

该设备结合患者剩余的周边视觉和假体的中心视觉。该芯片是光伏的，无线工作并植入在视网膜下。虽然当前版本提供黑白视觉，但未来的软件更新将启用灰度以改善面部识别。研究人员还在开发具有更小像素的更高分辨率芯片，以期达到20/80的视力，并有可能通过电子变焦达到接近20/20的视力。虽然一些参与者经历了副作用，但通常不危及生命且很快消退。

title: From VS Code to Helix
summary:
This article details the author's journey from using VS Code to Helix as their daily driver editor. Initially hesitant due to VS Code's ease of use and familiarity, and vim's complexity, the author was swayed by Helix's "out-of-the-box" functionality and intuitive select-then-operate workflow.

The author's shift was motivated by concerns over Microsoft's control and the desire for more balanced, international open-source tools. While fearing a steep learning curve, they found Helix surprisingly easy to adopt, particularly due to its interactive tutorial.

The article highlights the importance of proper documentation, praising a third-party resource for its user-centric approach. A significant portion is dedicated to configuring Helix for Markdown, Astro, and YAML, including installing and configuring language servers (marksman, harper-ls, rumdl, astro-ls, yaml-language-server) and formatters (dprint). The author provides specific instructions for integrating these tools, enabling features like code completion, grammar checking, and automatic formatting.

The author also addresses a UI issue with text alignment on wide screens and presents a workaround involving adjusting gutter width using custom keybindings. Finally, the article concludes that while Helix requires a bit more initial configuration than VS Code, the benefits of efficient editing, a more balanced toolchain, and deeper understanding of the editor's functionality make it worthwhile.
chinese_title: 从 VS Code 到 Helix
chinese_summary:
本文详细介绍了作者从使用 VS Code 过渡到以 Helix 作为日常主要编辑器的过程。起初，由于 VS Code 的易用性和熟悉程度，以及 Vim 的复杂性，作者对此犹豫不决，但 Helix 的“开箱即用”功能和直观的选择-然后-操作工作流程最终打动了作者。

作者的转变是出于对微软控制权的担忧以及对更平衡的国际化开源工具的渴望。尽管担心学习曲线陡峭，但他们发现 Helix 出乎意料地容易上手，尤其要归功于它的交互式教程。

本文强调了适当文档的重要性，并赞扬了一个第三方资源以用户为中心的编写方式。文章的很大一部分致力于配置 Helix 以支持 Markdown、Astro 和 YAML，包括安装和配置语言服务器（marksman、harper-ls、rumdl、astro-ls、yaml-language-server）和格式化工具（dprint）。作者提供了集成这些工具的具体说明，从而实现诸如代码完成、语法检查和自动格式化等功能。

作者还解决了宽屏上文本对齐的 UI 问题，并提出了一种通过使用自定义键绑定调整装订线宽度来解决此问题的方法。最后，文章总结说，虽然 Helix 比 VS Code 需要更多的初始配置，但高效编辑、更平衡的工具链以及对编辑器功能的更深入了解使其值得。

title: Recreating a Homebrew Game System from 1987
summary:
This article details a homebrew 8-bit game console called the Z80 TV Game, developed in 1987 by a Japanese electronics hobbyist. It uses a 4MHz Z80 processor, 32KB ROM cartridges (expandable via bank switching), 16KB of system ROM, 8KB of video RAM, and outputs 168x210 pixel black/white graphics at 60Hz composite video. Audio is 1-bit.

The system utilizes readily available ICs, with the controller input and audio output managed by either an Intel 8255 or Zilog Z80PIO. It supports Sega Master System and Mega Drive/Genesis controllers. The composite sync signal is generated using an EPROM.

The memory map includes cartridge ROM, system RAM, video RAM, and unused space. I/O maps differ slightly depending on whether the 8255 or Z80PIO is used.

The article provides resources for recreating the system, including schematics, PCB gerbers, KiCad files, and a bill of materials for the console and various cartridge designs (32KB, multi-cart, and experimental 256KB). Original schematics, game ROMs (26 games developed by Mr. Isizu and Inufuto), and cartridge dimensions are also available.

Software development can be done in Z80 assembly or C, with support from the Z88DK development kit, Cate compiler by Inufuto, and Cross-Lib framework. Emulators eZ80TVGAME and vdmgr also exist. The author acknowledges the contributions of Mr. Isizu, Inufuto, Takeda Toshiya and lsluk.
chinese_title: 重建1987年的自制游戏系统
chinese_summary:
本文详细介绍了一款名为 Z80 TV Game 的自制 8 位游戏机，该游戏机由一位日本电子爱好者于 1987 年开发。它采用 4MHz Z80 处理器、32KB ROM 卡带（可通过分页切换扩展）、16KB 系统 ROM、8KB 视频 RAM，并以 60Hz 复合视频输出 168x210 像素的黑白图形。音频为 1 位。

该系统利用现成的 IC，控制器输入和音频输出由 Intel 8255 或 Zilog Z80PIO 管理。它支持世嘉 Master System 和 Mega Drive/Genesis 手柄。复合同步信号使用 EPROM 生成。

内存映射包括卡带 ROM、系统 RAM、视频 RAM 和未使用的空间。I/O 映射因使用 8255 或 Z80PIO 而略有不同。

本文提供了用于重建系统的资源，包括原理图、PCB Gerber 文件、KiCad 文件以及控制台和各种卡带设计（32KB、多合一卡带和实验性 256KB）的物料清单。原始原理图、游戏 ROM（由 Isizu 先生和 Inufuto 开发的 26 款游戏）以及卡带尺寸也均可用。

软件开发可以使用 Z80 汇编或 C 语言完成，并获得 Z88DK 开发套件、Inufuto 的 Cate 编译器和 Cross-Lib 框架的支持。还存在模拟器 eZ80TVGAME 和 vdmgr。作者感谢 Isizu 先生、Inufuto、Takeda Toshiya 和 lsluk 的贡献。

title: Who needs Graphviz when you can build it yourself?
summary:
This article details the development of a custom graph layout algorithm, "iongraph," created to visualize the compilation process of JavaScript and WebAssembly code within SpiderMonkey's Ion optimizing compiler. Dissatisfied with the output of existing tools like Graphviz and Mermaid, the author sought a solution tailored to the specific needs and constraints of control flow graphs.

The article highlights the problems with Graphviz, including its unpredictable layouts that obscure code structure and instability where minor changes produce drastically different visualizations. Iongraph leverages the unique characteristics of control flow graphs (few cycles, reducible control flow) to create more intuitive and stable layouts.

The algorithm is based on a simplified version of the Sugiyama layout algorithm, broken down into four main steps:

1.  **Layering:** Organizes basic blocks into horizontal tracks (layers) based on their depth, handling loop structures to position blocks logically inside or outside of loops.
2.  **Create Dummy Nodes:** Inserts dummy nodes on edges that span multiple layers, maintaining consistent directional flow (downward on the left, upward on the right) and coalescing edges to the same destination.
3.  **Straighten Edges:** Applies iterative passes to align nodes and dummy nodes, improving edge straightness and overall visual clarity, including loop indentation and edge "combing."
4.  **Track Horizontal Edges:** Sorts horizontal edges into parallel tracks to prevent visual overlap, assigning vertical offsets and recording track heights for proper spacing.

The result is a fast, efficient, and surprisingly effective layout algorithm that produces stable and informative visualizations of the compiler's internal processes, implemented in roughly 1000 lines of JavaScript. The article also includes interactive demos and pseudocode for key parts of the algorithm.
chinese_title: 谁还需要Graphviz，自己就能建一个了？
chinese_summary:
本文详细介绍了自定义图布局算法“iongraph”的开发过程，该算法旨在可视化SpiderMonkey的Ion优化编译器中JavaScript和WebAssembly代码的编译过程。作者对Graphviz和Mermaid等现有工具的输出不满意，因此寻求一种针对控制流图的特定需求和约束而量身定制的解决方案。

文章强调了Graphviz的问题，包括其不可预测的布局会模糊代码结构，以及微小的更改会导致截然不同的可视化效果的不稳定性。 Iongraph利用控制流图的独特特征（循环少，可归约控制流）来创建更直观和稳定的布局。

该算法基于简化版的Sugiyama布局算法，分为四个主要步骤：

1.  **分层：** 根据基本块的深度将它们组织成水平轨道（层），处理循环结构以在循环内部或外部逻辑地定位块。
2.  **创建虚拟节点：** 在跨越多个层的边上插入虚拟节点，保持一致的定向流（左侧向下，右侧向上），并合并到相同目的地的边。
3.  **拉直边：** 应用迭代过程来对齐节点和虚拟节点，从而提高边的平直度和整体视觉清晰度，包括循环缩进和边“梳理”。
4.  **追踪水平边：** 将水平边排序到平行轨道中，以防止视觉重叠，分配垂直偏移量并记录轨道高度以实现适当的间距。

结果是一种快速、高效且出人意料的有效布局算法，可生成编译器内部进程的稳定且信息丰富的可视化效果，以大约1000行JavaScript实现。文章还包括交互式演示和算法关键部分的伪代码。

title: Hosting SQLite Databases on GitHub Pages (2021)
summary:
This article by phiresky (2021) explores hosting SQLite databases on static websites like GitHub Pages, circumventing the need for backend servers for small data-driven web tools. The problem addressed is the maintenance burden and reliance on external services associated with traditional backend approaches, or the inefficiency of downloading large datasets to the browser.

The solution involves compiling SQLite to WebAssembly (using sql.js) and creating a virtual file system (sql.js-httpvfs) that fetches database chunks via HTTP Range requests as needed. This allows the browser to query a full SQLite database without downloading the entire file upfront, optimizing for bandwidth and request overhead by using SQLite's page structure and pre-fetching sequential data.

The article demonstrates the solution with a demo using the World Development Indicators dataset, showing SQL queries, JSON functions, and JavaScript function integration within queries. It also illustrates performance considerations, emphasizing the importance of database indexing to minimize HTTP requests. The author demonstrates full-text search capabilities using SQLite's FTS module and provides an interactive example of charting data from the database. Furthermore, it showcases using the browser's DOM as a database through a virtual table.

A 2023 update highlights advancements inspired by this work, including libgen-ipfs, absurd-sql (using IndexedDB as a persistent store), and SQLite's official wasm support.
chinese_title: 在GitHub Pages上托管SQLite数据库（2021年）
chinese_summary:
phiresky (2021) 的这篇文章探讨了在 GitHub Pages 等静态网站上托管 SQLite 数据库的方法，从而规避了小型数据驱动型 Web 工具对后端服务器的需求。它所解决的问题是传统后端方法带来的维护负担和对外部服务的依赖，以及将大型数据集下载到浏览器的低效率。

该解决方案包括将 SQLite 编译为 WebAssembly（使用 sql.js）并创建一个虚拟文件系统 (sql.js-httpvfs)，该文件系统根据需要通过 HTTP Range 请求获取数据库块。 这使得浏览器可以在无需预先下载整个文件的情况下查询完整的 SQLite 数据库，通过使用 SQLite 的页面结构和预取顺序数据来优化带宽和请求开销。

文章通过使用世界发展指标数据集的演示来展示该解决方案，展示了 SQL 查询、JSON 函数和 JavaScript 函数在查询中的集成。它还说明了性能方面的考虑因素，强调了数据库索引对于最大限度地减少 HTTP 请求的重要性。作者演示了使用 SQLite 的 FTS 模块进行全文搜索的功能，并提供了从数据库中绘制数据的交互式示例。 此外，它还展示了如何通过虚拟表将浏览器的 DOM 用作数据库。

2023 年的更新突出了受此工作启发而取得的进展，包括 libgen-ipfs、absurd-sql（使用 IndexedDB 作为持久存储）和 SQLite 的官方 wasm 支持。

title: AWS to bare metal two years later: Answering your questions about leaving AWS
summary:
In 2023, OneUptime detailed how they saved $230,000/year by moving from AWS to bare metal. This follow-up addresses common questions and shares updates two years later. Key highlights include:

*   **Increased Savings:** Savings have grown to $1.2M/year.
*   **Financial Justification:** Reserved Instances/Savings Plans weren't enough to beat bare metal due to S3, egress, and other costs. A 76% saving compared to AWS.
*   **Migration Cost:** One week of engineer time was required, but much of it was for improvements needed anyway.
*   **Ongoing Ops:** Minimal engineer time (24 hours/quarter) due to automation and reliance on colo provider for physical management.
*   **Resilience:** They now have multiple racks across two DCs with isolated management paths and Anycast ingress for sub-minute failover, improving on their single-rack setup.
*   **Hardware Lifecycle:** Servers are amortized over five years, with plans to cascade older gear to regional analytics as needed.
*   **No Reinventing:** They leverage open-source tools (MicroK8s, Ceph, etc.) that align with their product's self-hosting promise.
*   **Selective Cloud Use:** Still using AWS for Glacier, CloudFront, and burst capacity load tests.
*   **Bandwidth and DDoS:** Committed to 5 Gbps across carriers and use Cloudflare for DDoS protection.
*   **Reliability:** Availability has improved to 99.993%.
*   **Compliance:** Maintained SOC 2 and ISO 27001, adapting processes for physical controls and change management.
*   **Alternative Cloud Providers:** Evaluated other providers but colocation was more cost-effective for their steady-state footprint.
*   **Toil:** Similar toil levels compared to AWS, but focused on different tasks (patching, upgrades).

They recommend bare metal for stable, high-volume workloads but acknowledge cloud's benefits for elasticity and managed services. Future plans include publishing a colo capex forecasting tool and a Talos deep dive.
chinese_title: AWS两年后迁移到裸金属：解答您关于离开AWS的问题
chinese_summary:
2023年，OneUptime详述了他们通过从AWS迁移到裸金属服务器，每年节省23万美元的案例。本篇后续文章解答了常见问题，并分享了两年后的更新。主要亮点包括：

*   **节省增加：** 节省已增长至每年120万美元。
*   **财务依据：** 由于S3、出口流量和其他成本，预留实例/节省计划不足以击败裸金属服务器。与AWS相比，节省了76%。
*   **迁移成本：** 需要一周的工程师时间，但其中大部分是为了进行无论如何都需要的改进。
*   **持续运营：** 由于自动化和依赖主机托管提供商进行物理管理，工程师所需时间极少（每季度24小时）。
*   **弹性：** 他们现在在两个数据中心拥有多个机架，具有隔离的管理路径和任播入口，可在不到一分钟内实现故障转移，这比他们之前的单机架设置有所改进。
*   **硬件生命周期：** 服务器按五年摊销，并计划根据需要在区域分析中级联旧设备。
*   **无需重复发明：** 他们利用与产品自托管承诺一致的开源工具（MicroK8s、Ceph等）。
*   **选择性云使用：** 仍然使用AWS Glacier、CloudFront和突发容量负载测试。
*   **带宽和DDoS：** 承诺跨运营商提供5 Gbps带宽，并使用Cloudflare进行DDoS保护。
*   **可靠性：** 可用性已提高到99.993%。
*   **合规性：** 保持了SOC 2和ISO 27001，调整了物理控制和变更管理流程。
*   **替代云提供商：** 评估了其他提供商，但对于他们的稳态占用空间而言，主机托管更具成本效益。
*   **苦工：** 与AWS相比，苦工程度相似，但专注于不同的任务（打补丁、升级）。

他们建议对稳定、高容量的工作负载使用裸金属服务器，但也承认云在弹性和托管服务方面的优势。未来的计划包括发布一个主机托管资本支出预测工具和一个Talos深度分析。

title: ChatGPT's Atlas: The Browser That's Anti-Web
summary:
This article critiques OpenAI's new browser, Atlas, arguing it's "anti-web" because it prioritizes AI-generated content over direct access to websites and the traditional web experience. The author identifies three main problems:

1. **AI Substitution:** Atlas substitutes AI-generated content resembling web pages for actual websites, potentially misleading users and isolating them from original sources. For instance, a search for "Taylor Swift" yielded AI-generated biographical info with no links to her official website.

2. **Return to Command-Line Interface:** Atlas relies on users guessing the correct commands to type instead of utilizing intuitive clickable links, reminiscent of outdated command-line interfaces and text adventure games. This makes navigation slower, more prone to error, and less discoverable.

3. **User as AI Agent:** While Atlas claims to act as a user's "agent," it actually exploits users to gather data that OpenAI couldn't access otherwise. By enabling features like "memories" and "Ask ChatGPT," users unwittingly provide the browser with access to confidential documents, private browsing activity, and unfinished thoughts, creating a comprehensive surveillance profile. The author argues that this data collection benefits OpenAI more than the user. An example is given of booking a flight, which the AI botches despite navigating the website smoothly.

The article concludes by emphasizing the potential dangers of a browser that relies on emotional dependency, advocating for a warning label similar to that on addictive technologies, and defending the open and accessible nature of the web. The author calls for innovation that enhances, not replaces, the existing web experience.
chinese_title: ChatGPT地图集：反Web浏览器
chinese_summary:
本文批评了 OpenAI 的新型浏览器 Atlas，认为其“反网络”，因为它优先考虑人工智能生成的内容，而不是直接访问网站和传统的网络体验。作者指出了三个主要问题：

1. **AI 替代：** Atlas 用类似于网页的人工智能生成内容来替代实际的网站，可能会误导用户，并将他们与原始来源隔离开来。例如，搜索“泰勒·斯威夫特”会产生人工智能生成的传记信息，但没有链接到她的官方网站。

2. **回归命令行界面：** Atlas 依赖用户猜测正确的命令来输入，而不是利用直观的可点击链接，让人想起过时的命令行界面和文本冒险游戏。这使得导航速度变慢、更容易出错，并且更难发现。

3. **用户作为 AI 代理：** 虽然 Atlas 声称充当用户的“代理”，但它实际上是在利用用户收集 OpenAI 无法访问的数据。 通过启用诸如“记忆”和“询问 ChatGPT”之类的功能，用户不知不觉地让浏览器可以访问机密文档、私人浏览活动和未完成的想法，从而创建全面的监视配置文件。 作者认为，这种数据收集对 OpenAI 的益处大于对用户的益处。文中给出了预订航班的例子，即使 AI 机器人顺利浏览了网站，预订结果仍然出错。

文章最后强调了一种依赖情感依赖的浏览器的潜在危险，主张添加类似于成瘾技术的警告标签，并捍卫网络的开放和可访问性。作者呼吁进行创新，以增强而非取代现有的网络体验。

title: Show HN: HUD-like live annotation and sketching app for macOS
summary:
Draw Over It is a macOS application designed for live screen annotation and sketching. It provides an always-on overlay that floats above any application, allowing users to draw directly on the screen for presentations, training, or general professional use. The overlay is toggled with a hotkey (⌃⌥⌘D) or via the menu bar, and can be quickly hidden when not needed.

The app features a HUD (Heads-Up Display) toolkit, accessible via right-click (or ⌃⌥⌘H), which offers various tools like pens, highlighters, shapes, blur, and session controls. Users can easily customize pen widths, opacity, fill modes, and color presets. A blur tool helps focus attention on key areas by obscuring the rest of the screen.

Draw Over It allows users to save the canvas state for later use, export the canvas as transparent PNGs, and supports 14 languages. It also offers undo/redo functionality and an eraser (activated by holding Option). The app remembers annotations between sessions unless the "Ephemeral Canvas" option is enabled.

Exports are saved in `~/Library/Application Support/DrawOverIt/Exports`. The application is compatible with macOS 13.5 and later, supporting both Apple Silicon and Intel processors. The main benefit is to make visualising ideas on screen quickly and easily accessible.
chinese_title: Show HN: macOS 上的 HUD 风格实时标注和草图应用
chinese_summary:
Draw Over It 是一款 macOS 应用程序，专为实时屏幕注释和草图绘制而设计。它提供始终置顶的叠加层，浮动于任何应用程序之上，允许用户直接在屏幕上进行绘图，适用于演示、培训或一般专业用途。叠加层可以通过热键 (⌃⌥⌘D) 或菜单栏切换，并且在不需要时可以快速隐藏。

该应用程序具有一个 HUD（抬头显示）工具包，可以通过右键单击（或 ⌃⌥⌘H）访问，提供各种工具，如笔、荧光笔、形状、模糊和会话控制。用户可以轻松自定义笔的粗细、不透明度、填充模式和颜色预设。模糊工具可以通过遮蔽屏幕的其余部分来帮助将注意力集中在关键区域。

Draw Over It 允许用户保存画布状态以供以后使用，将画布导出为透明 PNG，并支持 14 种语言。它还提供撤消/重做功能和橡皮擦（按住 Option 激活）。除非启用“临时画布”选项，否则该应用程序会记住会话之间的注释。

导出文件保存在 `~/Library/Application Support/DrawOverIt/Exports` 中。该应用程序兼容 macOS 13.5 及更高版本，支持 Apple Silicon 和 Intel 处理器。主要优点是使屏幕上的可视化想法能够快速且轻松地访问。

title: Tips for stroke-surviving software engineers
summary:
James Padolsey, a software engineer who survived a hemorrhagic stroke in the parietal lobe, offers advice tailored for other stroke-surviving engineers, especially those with residual epilepsy. His primary message is to prioritize health above all else, advocating for self-awareness and firm boundaries.

Key tips include:

*   **Stopping immediately:** Any signs of fatigue, fuzziness, or weird sensations are signals to rest and hydrate.
*   **Controlling input:** Minimize distractions with headphones, blinders, and saying "no" to unnecessary demands.
*   **Leveraging legal protections:** Utilize anti-discrimination laws and employee assistance programs.
*   **Single-threading work:** Avoid context switching, batch tasks, and externalize working memory using notebooks and lists.
*   **Using AI as a scratchpad:** Offload state management to AI tools.
*   **Prioritizing tasks:** Tackle heavy thinking during peak cognitive windows.
*   **Minimizing attention drain:** Disable notifications and avoid synchronous communication.
*   **Avoiding long meetings:** Prefer emails, as communication can be mentally taxing.

He emphasizes the importance of understanding how specific brain areas (frontal and parietal cortices) are affected by tasks like context switching, mental navigation, and working memory. He notes that post-stroke, hyperexcitability near the lesion lowers seizure threshold, making cognitive overload particularly risky. Padolsey acknowledges his own struggles with implementing these strategies but underscores the importance of self-advocacy and setting boundaries.
chinese_title: 中风幸存软件工程师的建议
chinese_summary:
软件工程师詹姆斯·帕多尔西在顶叶出血性中风后幸存，他为其他中风后幸存的工程师，特别是那些患有残留性癫痫的工程师，提供了量身定制的建议。他的主要信息是将健康置于一切之上，提倡自我意识和坚定界限。

主要建议包括：

*   **立即停止：** 任何疲劳、模糊或奇怪的感觉都是休息和补充水分的信号。
*   **控制输入：** 使用耳机、眼罩，并对不必要的需求说“不”，以最大限度地减少干扰。
*   **利用法律保护：** 利用反歧视法和员工援助计划。
*   **单线程工作：** 避免上下文切换，批量处理任务，并使用笔记本和列表外化工作记忆。
*   **将人工智能作为草稿本：** 将状态管理卸载到人工智能工具。
*   **优先处理任务：** 在认知高峰期处理繁重的思考。
*   **最大限度地减少注意力消耗：** 禁用通知，避免同步通信。
*   **避免冗长会议：** 尽量选择电子邮件，因为沟通在精神上可能很累。

他强调了理解特定大脑区域（额叶和顶叶皮层）如何受到上下文切换、心理导航和工作记忆等任务的影响的重要性。 他指出，中风后，病灶附近的过度兴奋会降低癫痫发作的阈值，使得认知超载尤其危险。 帕多尔西承认自己在实施这些策略方面的挣扎，但强调了自我倡导和设定界限的重要性。

summary:
AirTips is presented as an alternative to services like Bento.me and Linktree, offering a platform to consolidate links and projects. The platform emphasizes compactness, customizability, and API readiness. It's currently invite-only.

Key features highlighted include:

*   **Compactness:** Designed for a streamlined presentation of information.
*   **Customizability:** Allowing users to build precise UIs with HTML.
*   **API-Ready:** Offers an API for programmatic interaction.

The platform uses a modular approach, enabling users to add text modules, custom HTML (Tailwind CSS is specifically mentioned), and other elements. Examples of potential layouts and content types (responsive grids, badges, cards, headings, lists, emojis, inline SVG) are provided. Security is also emphasized with a "no scripts" policy.

The platform also allows for showcasing projects with descriptions and links. Metrics can also be added to the platform. Finally, there are links to pricing, API and custom HTML documentation.

title: uBlock Origin Lite Apple App Store
summary:
uBlock Origin Lite (uBOL) is a content blocker app available on the Apple App Store, created by Raymond Hill. It offers similar default filter lists to the popular uBlock Origin extension, including uBlock Origin's built-in filters, EasyList, EasyPrivacy, and Peter Lowe’s ad and tracking server list. Users can enable additional rulesets within the app's options.

A key feature of uBOL is its declarative nature, meaning filtering is handled directly by the browser using CSS/JS injection, rather than a constant background process. This minimizes CPU and memory usage, with the app's service worker only active during interaction with the settings or popup panel.

The latest version, 2025.1028.1744, updates the filter lists. Reviews are overwhelmingly positive, with users praising its availability on iPadOS and Safari, as well as its effective ad blocking capabilities. One reviewer noted an earlier battery drain issue in the TestFlight version, which has since been improved. A common wish is the ability to add custom lists, though users are generally satisfied with the default configuration.

The app's privacy policy states that the developer collects no data. It's a free app, categorized as a Utility, and compatible across iPhone, iPad, Mac and Apple Vision devices running the required OS versions.
chinese_title:
uBlock Origin Lite Apple App Store
uBlock Origin Lite 苹果应用商店
chinese_summary:
uBlock Origin Lite (uBOL) 是由 Raymond Hill 创建的，可在 Apple App Store 上下载的内容拦截器应用。它提供与流行的 uBlock Origin 扩展类似的默认过滤器列表，包括 uBlock Origin 的内置过滤器、EasyList、EasyPrivacy 以及 Peter Lowe 的广告和跟踪服务器列表。用户可以在应用的选项中启用其他规则集。

uBOL 的一个关键特性是其声明性，意味着过滤直接由浏览器使用 CSS/JS 注入处理，而不是通过持续的后台进程。这最大限度地减少了 CPU 和内存的使用，应用的服务工作线程仅在与设置或弹出面板交互时才处于活动状态。

最新版本 2025.1028.1744 更新了过滤器列表。评论绝大多数是正面的，用户称赞其在 iPadOS 和 Safari 上的可用性以及有效的广告拦截能力。一位评论者指出 TestFlight 版本中早期存在的电池消耗问题，该问题已经得到改善。一个常见的愿望是能够添加自定义列表，但用户通常对默认配置感到满意。

该应用的隐私政策声明开发者不收集任何数据。它是一款免费应用，归类为实用工具，并且兼容运行所需操作系统版本的 iPhone、iPad、Mac 和 Apple Vision 设备。

title: Kafka is Fast – I'll use Postgres
summary:
This article argues that Postgres can be a viable alternative to Kafka for pub/sub messaging and queueing in many use cases, especially those with moderate workloads. It challenges the trend of adopting complex, specialized technologies like Kafka without carefully considering if their scale and features are truly necessary.

The author introduces two opposing "camps": one chasing buzzwords and another favoring common sense and simpler solutions. They highlight the "Small Data" movement and the "Postgres Renaissance" as trends supporting the latter. The argument is that Postgres, with its versatility and reliability, combined with powerful modern hardware, can handle 80% of the use cases of specialized systems with 20% of the effort.

The article then presents benchmarks of Postgres as a pub/sub system and as a queue. The pub/sub benchmark simulates a Kafka-like log structure using Postgres primitives, demonstrating that a single-node Postgres instance can handle 4.8 MiB/s write throughput and 24.6 MiB/s read throughput with low latency. A three-node replicated setup maintains similar throughput with a moderate latency increase. Queue benchmarks, while showing lower throughput, still demonstrate respectable performance.

The author concludes that for many common workloads, Postgres can be a simpler and more cost-effective solution than Kafka, especially considering the high costs associated with vendor-managed Kafka services. The article encourages readers to consider Postgres as a viable alternative and to avoid blindly adopting complex technologies without a clear understanding of their needs.
chinese_title: Kafka 很快——但我会用 Postgres。
chinese_summary:
本文认为，在许多使用场景中，尤其是中等负载场景下，Postgres 可以作为 Kafka 的可行替代方案，用于发布/订阅消息传递和队列。它挑战了盲目采用复杂、专业的 Kafka 等技术，而不认真考虑其规模和功能是否真正必要的趋势。

作者提出了两个对立的“阵营”：一个追逐流行语，另一个则倾向于常识和更简单的解决方案。他们强调“小数据”运动和“Postgres 复兴”是支持后者的趋势。 论点是，Postgres 凭借其多功能性和可靠性，结合强大的现代硬件，可以用 20% 的精力处理专业系统 80% 的使用场景。

然后，本文展示了 Postgres 作为发布/订阅系统和队列的基准测试。 发布/订阅基准测试使用 Postgres 原语模拟类似 Kafka 的日志结构，表明单节点 Postgres 实例可以处理 4.8 MiB/s 的写入吞吐量和 24.6 MiB/s 的读取吞吐量，且延迟较低。 三节点复制设置保持相似的吞吐量，但延迟略有增加。 队列基准测试虽然显示较低的吞吐量，但仍然表现出可观的性能。

作者总结说，对于许多常见的工作负载，Postgres 可以比 Kafka 更简单、更经济高效的解决方案，尤其是考虑到与供应商管理的 Kafka 服务相关的高成本。 本文鼓励读者考虑将 Postgres 作为一种可行的替代方案，并避免在不清楚了解自身需求的情况下盲目采用复杂的技术。

title: Minecraft removing obfuscation in Java Edition
summary:
Minecraft: Java Edition is removing obfuscation (code scrambling) to make modding easier. Currently, the game uses obfuscation to hide the source code, forcing modders to painstakingly decipher classes and functions. In 2019, Mojang released "obfuscation mappings" to help match obfuscated and unobfuscated terms, but now they are taking the next step by completely removing obfuscation.

Starting with the first snapshot after the "Mounts of Mayhem" launch, the game will ship with original variable and function names, streamlining the modding process. This means easier mod creation, updating, and debugging, as modders won't need to untangle complex code or decipher unclear names. Debugging will also become easier as crash logs will be readable.

To ease the transition, Mojang will release "experimental release" versions alongside the obfuscated versions. This allows modders to test and adjust their tools and workflows before the full transition.

Important aspects for modders: The obfuscation maps will be removed from version .jsons, the client and server .jar files will no longer be obfuscated, and each .jar file will include a LICENSE file with a direct link to the EULA. The Minecraft EULA and Usage Guidelines remain in effect, ensuring that all mods adhere to the established rules.
chinese_title: Minecraft Java版移除混淆
chinese_summary:
Minecraft：Java版将移除混淆代码以简化Mod制作。目前，游戏使用代码混淆来隐藏源代码，迫使Mod制作者费力地解读类和函数。2019年，Mojang发布了“混淆映射”以帮助匹配混淆和未混淆的术语，但现在他们正采取下一步行动，彻底移除代码混淆。

从“混乱山脉”发布后的第一个快照开始，游戏将附带原始变量和函数名称，从而简化Mod制作流程。这意味着Mod的创建、更新和调试将变得更容易，因为Mod制作者不再需要解开复杂的代码或解读不清晰的名称。调试也将变得更容易，因为崩溃日志将变得可读。

为了方便过渡，Mojang将发布“实验性版本”与混淆版本并行。这允许Mod制作者在完全过渡之前测试和调整他们的工具和工作流程。

Mod制作者需要注意的重要方面：混淆映射将从版本.jsons中移除，客户端和服务器.jar文件将不再被混淆，并且每个.jar文件将包含一个LICENSE文件，其中包含EULA的直接链接。Minecraft EULA和使用指南仍然有效，确保所有Mod都遵守既定规则。

title: SpiderMonkey Garbage Collector
summary:
The SpiderMonkey garbage collector (GC) is responsible for managing memory allocation and deallocation in Firefox's JavaScript engine. It's designed for speed and efficiency, handling both JavaScript data and some internal SpiderMonkey structures.

It's a hybrid tracing collector with several key features:

*   **Precise:** It accurately tracks memory layout and stack roots, avoiding unnecessary retention of garbage.
*   **Incremental:** It breaks down execution into smaller slices to minimize pauses for users, though some operations like root marking and compacting are not fully incremental.
*   **Generational:** It uses a two-generation approach (nursery for young, frequently collected objects, and tenured heap for older objects) to optimize collection frequency.
*   **Partially Concurrent:** Some GC tasks, like finalization and memory management, occur concurrently with the main program.
*   **Parallel:** GC slices are processed in parallel to leverage multi-core systems.
*   **Compacting:** It rearranges data within arenas to reduce fragmentation, though this is a less frequent, non-incremental operation.
*   **Partitioned Heap:** Uses 'zones' which are independent heaps that can be collected independently. This helps with incremental collection.

The collector aims to minimize user impact by performing most collection work incrementally and in parallel. Compacting is used to combat fragmentation when necessary. The article directs readers to the SpiderMonkey source code for more detailed information.

title: Oracle has adopted BOOLEAN in 23ai and PostgreSQL had it forever
summary:
This article discusses Oracle's recent (2025) adoption of the native `BOOLEAN` data type in its 23ai release and contrasts it with PostgreSQL, which has supported `BOOLEAN` for over two decades.  Before 23ai, Oracle developers used workarounds like `VARCHAR2` or `NUMBER` to represent boolean values, leading to potential performance issues due to conversions and larger indexes.

The article highlights the advantages of a native `BOOLEAN` type, emphasizing its efficiency in storage (single byte in PostgreSQL), simpler queries (no string comparisons needed), faster filtering, and improved readability. It contrasts the table structures and insert/select statements in Oracle (before 23ai) and PostgreSQL to demonstrate the benefits.

The article presents a table comparing `BOOLEAN` with the workarounds `CHAR(1)/CHAR(5)` and `SMALLINT/NUMBER(1)` across aspects like meaning, storage, type safety, query simplicity, value interpretation, readability, and language integration, concluding that `BOOLEAN` is the optimal data type.

Finally, the article promotes HexaRocket, a tool that automates the migration from Oracle to PostgreSQL, including automatic mapping of Oracle's `CHAR(1)` and `NUMBER(1)` to PostgreSQL's `BOOLEAN`. It also mentions HexaCluster's PostgreSQL support and migration services.
chinese_title: Oracle 在 23ai 中采用了 BOOLEAN，而 PostgreSQL 一直都有。
chinese_summary:
本文探讨了Oracle最近（2025年）在其23ai版本中采用原生`BOOLEAN`数据类型，并将其与已支持`BOOLEAN`超过二十年的PostgreSQL进行了对比。 在23ai之前，Oracle开发人员使用`VARCHAR2`或`NUMBER`等变通方法来表示布尔值，导致因转换和更大的索引而可能出现性能问题。

本文重点介绍了原生`BOOLEAN`类型的优势，强调了其在存储（PostgreSQL中为单字节）、更简单的查询（无需字符串比较）、更快的过滤和更高的可读性方面的效率。 它对比了Oracle（23ai之前）和PostgreSQL中的表结构和insert/select语句，以展示其益处。

本文提供了一个表格，从含义、存储、类型安全、查询简易性、值解释、可读性和语言集成等方面比较了`BOOLEAN`与`CHAR(1)/CHAR(5)`和`SMALLINT/NUMBER(1)`的变通方法，并得出结论：`BOOLEAN`是最佳数据类型。

最后，本文推广了HexaRocket，该工具可自动执行从Oracle到PostgreSQL的迁移，包括自动将Oracle的`CHAR(1)`和`NUMBER(1)`映射到PostgreSQL的`BOOLEAN`。它还提到了HexaCluster的PostgreSQL支持和迁移服务。

title: Berkeley Out-of-Order RISC-V Processor (Boom) (2020)
summary:
The Berkeley Out-of-Order Machine (BOOM) is an open-source out-of-order RISC-V processor design heavily influenced by the MIPS R10000 and Alpha 21264 processors. Like these predecessors, BOOM employs a unified physical register file design, enabling explicit register renaming.

A key feature of BOOM is its implementation in Chisel, a hardware construction language. This allows BOOM to be a *generator* of out-of-order designs, rather than a single, fixed core. This means BOOM represents a family of configurable processor designs.

Furthermore, BOOM utilizes the Rocket Chip SoC generator as a library, leveraging its micro-architectural structures like TLBs and PTWs. This modular approach facilitates the construction of complete System-on-Chips (SoCs) incorporating a BOOM core. In summary, BOOM is a flexible and customizable out-of-order RISC-V processor design leveraging modern hardware generation techniques and established microarchitectural principles.

title: Cursor 2.0
summary:
Cursor 2.0 introduces significant enhancements focused on agentic coding, performance, and team collaboration. Key features include the launch of "Composer," a faster agentic coding model, and the general availability (GA) of Browser for Agent with embedded in-editor tools.  It also offers improvements to code review, and the GA of sandboxed terminals on macOS, enhancing security.

Team collaboration is boosted through custom commands and rules centrally managed for all team members. Voice Mode enables control of Agent through speech. Performance is drastically improved via Language Server Protocols (LSPs), especially noticeable with agent and diff usage, including faster Python and TypeScript LSPs and memory leak fixes.

Plan Mode allows plan creation with one model and building with another, either in the foreground or background. Sharing team commands and prompts is streamlined, and the prompt UI is improved. Agent Harness has been enhanced, notably improving quality for GPT-5 Codex. Cloud Agents offer 99.9% reliability, instant startup, and a new UI.

For Enterprise users, Cursor 2.0 provides admin controls for sandboxed terminals, cloud distribution of hooks, and an audit log for admin events.

title: What we talk about when we talk about sideloading
summary:
This article argues that Google is falsely claiming sideloading is not going away on Android, despite new developer verification requirements that effectively end users' freedom to choose what software they install. The author criticizes the term "sideloading" as a misleading label and emphasizes that it simply means installing software, regardless of the source.

The author contends that Google's developer verification decree forces developers to register with Google, pay fees, and provide identification to distribute apps, undermining the open nature of Android and giving Google excessive control over software distribution. This restricts users' ability to install apps from sources like F-Droid or directly from developers, even if using alternative app stores like the Samsung Galaxy Store.

The author questions Google's claim that sideloading leads to more malware, citing instances of malware found on the Google Play Store and highlighting the potential for commercial incentives to compromise Google's judgment.

The article highlights Google's recent controversial actions, such as crippling ad-blockers in Chrome and restricting the Android Open Source Project (AOSP), further demonstrating a trend towards control. It calls on consumers to advocate for an open Android ecosystem and urges developers to reject Google's developer registration program. The author argues that users own their phones and have the right to choose their software sources.
chinese_title: 当我们谈论侧载时，我们在谈论什么
chinese_summary:
本文认为，尽管谷歌推出了新的开发者验证要求，实际上剥夺了用户选择安装软件的自由，但谷歌却虚假地声称侧载在安卓系统中不会消失。作者批评“侧载”这一术语具有误导性，并强调它仅仅意味着安装软件，无论来源如何。

作者认为，谷歌的开发者验证法令迫使开发者向谷歌注册，支付费用并提供身份证明才能分发应用程序，这破坏了安卓的开放性，并赋予谷歌对软件分发的过度控制权。这限制了用户从 F-Droid 或直接从开发者处安装应用程序的能力，即使是使用像三星 Galaxy Store 这样的替代应用商店也不例外。

作者质疑谷歌声称侧载会导致更多恶意软件的说法，并引用了在 Google Play 商店中发现恶意软件的案例，并强调了商业动机有可能损害谷歌的判断。

本文强调了谷歌最近备受争议的行为，例如削弱 Chrome 中的广告拦截器和限制 Android 开放源代码项目 (AOSP)，进一步证明了一种走向控制的趋势。它呼吁消费者倡导开放的安卓生态系统，并敦促开发者拒绝谷歌的开发者注册计划。作者认为用户拥有自己的手机，并有权选择他们的软件来源。

title: Boring is what we wanted
summary:
This article argues that the "boring" incremental upgrades of Apple silicon Macs are exactly what users wanted after years of inconsistent hardware during the PowerPC and Intel eras. The author reminisces about the transformative impact of the M1 Macs, highlighting their superior speed, efficiency, and battery life, a departure from the trade-offs inherent in previous PC computing.

The author contends that Apple's control over its silicon has allowed for predictable and consistent progress, shipping regular updates that improve both power and efficiency. He contrasts this with the past, where Mac updates were often delayed due to reliance on external partners, leading to issues like faulty NVIDIA cards and overheating iMacs. While acknowledging Apple's past mistakes (e.g., the butterfly keyboard), the author emphasizes that owning the core technology allows Apple to deliver steady hardware development.

The piece directly addresses the criticism that recent M-series chip updates are "boring," arguing that this predictability is a positive outcome. The author points to a chart illustrating consistent improvements in Apple silicon, suggesting that the upgrades are meaningful, especially for users who don't upgrade annually. The author concludes that calling Apple silicon's success "boring" is downplaying its achievements and ignoring the consistent progress users have long desired.

title: UIs Are Not Pure Functions of the Model – React.js and Cocoa Side by Side (2018)
summary:
This article compares React.js's approach to UI development with Cocoa's MVC framework, arguing that React's core premise of UIs being pure functions of the model is flawed and leads to unnecessary complexity.

The author contrasts React's concepts of transformation, abstraction, composition, state management, memoization, and list handling with Cocoa's equivalents. They contend that Cocoa, with its object-oriented approach and stable view hierarchy, handles these aspects more efficiently and naturally.

The author criticizes React's reliance on pure functions, arguing that UIs inherently have state specific to their projection (e.g., scroll position) and shouldn't be forced into an immutable data model. They also point out that React's attempts to address the limitations of this pure function approach, through techniques like memoization, state maps, and algebraic effects, only add complexity and contradict the initial premise.

Furthermore, the article highlights Cocoa's advantages in handling UI stability and optimization through its event loop and drawRect method. It argues that Cocoa's model allows for direct manipulation of UI-specific state and context without the need for complex data passing mechanisms like React's "context." The author concludes that the pursuit of UIs as pure functions leads to an "avalanche of problems" and is fueled by an overzealous embrace of functional programming concepts.

title: Apple will phase out Rosetta 2 in macOS 28
summary:
The article title "Apple will phase out Rosetta 2 in macOS 28" suggests that Apple plans to remove Rosetta 2 from its macOS operating system with the release of macOS 28.

Rosetta 2 is a translation environment that allows Macs with Apple silicon to run applications built for Intel-based Macs. Its purpose is to bridge the gap during the transition from Intel processors to Apple silicon, ensuring compatibility with older software.

The inclusion of the "About the Rosetta translation environment | Apple Developer Documentation" link suggests that the phase-out would involve developers needing to update or recompile their applications to be natively compatible with Apple silicon. Developers may need to consider offering universal binaries that support both architectures.

Phasing out Rosetta 2 signals that Apple believes the transition to Apple silicon is largely complete, and there's less need for the compatibility layer. This likely means that the vast majority of commonly used applications have been updated to run natively on Apple silicon, or that suitable alternatives are available.

While the linked page from Apple Developer Documentation cannot be viewed in its entirety without JavaScript enabled, the title heavily implies Apple's intention to remove Rosetta 2 in the future. This action will likely prompt developers to prioritize native Apple silicon support to avoid compatibility issues for users running future versions of macOS.

包含“关于 Rosetta 转换环境 | Apple Developer 文档”链接表明，逐步淘汰将涉及开发人员需要更新或重新编译其应用程序，使其与 Apple 芯片原生兼容。开发人员可能需要考虑提供支持两种架构的通用二进制文件。

逐步淘汰 Rosetta 2 表明 Apple 认为向 Apple 芯片的过渡已基本完成，并且对兼容层的需求减少。这可能意味着绝大多数常用应用程序已更新为在 Apple 芯片上原生运行，或者存在合适的替代方案。

虽然没有启用 JavaScript 就无法完整查看 Apple Developer 文档中的链接页面，但标题强烈暗示了 Apple 未来移除 Rosetta 2 的意图。此举可能会促使开发人员优先考虑原生 Apple 芯片支持，以避免运行未来版本 macOS 的用户出现兼容性问题。

title: Generative AI Image Editing Showdown
summary:
This "Generative AI Image Editing Showdown" article focuses on a comparison of different Generative AI (GenAI) tools used for image editing. It likely examines the capabilities, strengths, and weaknesses of various AI platforms designed to modify, enhance, or create images.

The showdown probably assesses the tools based on criteria like:

*   **Ease of Use:** How intuitive and accessible the tools are for users with varying levels of expertise.
*   **Image Quality:** The quality of the generated or modified images, including resolution, detail, and realism.
*   **Functionality:** The range of editing tasks the tools can perform, such as inpainting (filling in missing parts), outpainting (expanding image boundaries), style transfer, object removal, and more.
*   **Speed and Efficiency:** How quickly the tools process images and generate results.
*   **Cost:** The pricing models of the tools, whether they are free, subscription-based, or pay-per-use.
*   **Accuracy:** How well the tools interpret and execute user prompts and instructions.

The article's aim is to provide readers with an understanding of the current landscape of GenAI image editing tools and to help them choose the best option based on their specific needs and budget. It could highlight the leading contenders in the market and discuss the potential future developments in this rapidly evolving field. Ultimately, the article seeks to inform readers about the power and limitations of using AI to transform images.
chinese_title: 生成式AI图像编辑对决
chinese_summary:
生成式AI图像编辑工具大比拼：本文重点比较用于图像编辑的不同生成式AI(GenAI)工具。它可能会考察各种AI平台在修改、增强或创建图像方面的能力、优势和劣势。

这次比拼可能会根据以下标准评估这些工具：

*   **易用性：** 这些工具对于不同专业水平用户的直观性和可访问性如何。
*   **图像质量：** 生成或修改后的图像质量，包括分辨率、细节和真实感。
*   **功能性：** 这些工具可以执行的编辑任务范围，例如图像修复（填充缺失部分）、图像扩展（扩展图像边界）、风格迁移、物体移除等等。
*   **速度和效率：** 这些工具处理图像和生成结果的速度有多快。
*   **成本：** 这些工具的定价模式，无论是免费、订阅制还是按次付费。
*   **准确性：** 这些工具解释和执行用户提示和指令的能力如何。

本文旨在帮助读者了解当前生成式AI图像编辑工具的现状，并帮助他们根据自身特定需求和预算选择最佳方案。它可能会重点介绍市场上的主要竞争者，并讨论这个快速发展领域中未来的潜在发展。最终，本文旨在告知读者使用AI转换图像的能力和局限性。

title: Google Play Store Stops Requiring the Use of Google Play Billing in the US
summary:
In response to a US District Court injunction upheld by the Ninth Circuit on September 12, 2025, Google Play Store has made significant policy changes for developers serving users in the United States, effective October 29, 2025.

Crucially, Google will no longer mandate the use of Google Play Billing for in-app purchases within apps distributed through the Play Store in the US. Developers are now free to utilize alternative in-app payment methods and communicate their availability to users. Furthermore, developers can now inform users about the pricing and availability of their app outside of the Google Play Store and provide links for direct downloads or transactions. They are also free to inform users of the availability of alternate payment methods.

Google has also committed to not forcing developers to base their app pricing on whether or not Google Play Billing is used.

These policy changes are explicitly for the US market and are in effect only while the US District Court's order remains active. Google states these updates supersede any conflicting restrictions in their existing Payments policy. Google plans to share further details on program requirements and business model adjustments to maintain user trust and safety, incorporating feedback from developers and users. Additional policy adjustments consistent with the injunction will be announced on the Google Play policy page.
chinese_title: Google Play商店停止要求美国地区使用Google Play结算系统
chinese_summary:
为响应美国第九巡回法院于2025年9月12日维持的美国地方法院禁令，自2025年10月29日起，Google Play商店针对服务于美国用户的开发者实施了重大政策变更。

关键在于，Google将不再强制要求在美国Play商店分发的应用程序内购买使用Google Play结算系统。 开发者现在可以自由使用其他应用内支付方式，并向用户告知其可用性。 此外，开发者现在可以告知用户其应用程序在Google Play商店之外的价格和可用性，并提供直接下载或交易的链接。 他们还可以自由告知用户其他支付方式的可用性。

Google还承诺不会强迫开发者根据是否使用Google Play结算系统来确定其应用程序的定价。

这些政策变更明确针对美国市场，且仅在美国地方法院的命令仍然有效时生效。 Google声明这些更新取代了其现有支付政策中任何冲突的限制。 Google计划分享有关程序要求和业务模式调整的更多细节，以维护用户信任和安全，并纳入来自开发者和用户的反馈。 与该禁令相一致的其他政策调整将在Google Play政策页面上公布。

title: New attacks are diluting secure enclave defenses from Nvidia, AMD, and Intel
summary:
This article highlights critical vulnerabilities in Trusted Execution Environments (TEEs) from Nvidia, AMD, and Intel, undermining the security assurances they offer. A new attack, "TEE.fail," bypasses the latest TEE protections by physically interposing hardware between a memory chip and the motherboard, requiring only brief physical access and kernel OS compromise. This attack, along with previous ones like Battering RAM and Wiretap, exposes the limitations of TEEs against physical attacks, which chipmakers often exclude from their threat models.

The article criticizes the misleading marketing by chipmakers and TEE users, including major tech companies like Cloudflare, Anthropic, Microsoft, Meta, and Signal, who overstate the protection offered, often implying resistance to physical attacks. Researcher HD Moore emphasizes the difficulty for customers to understand the actual security they're getting with confidential computing.

The attacks exploit deterministic encryption, a weaker form of encryption that's vulnerable to replay attacks. TEE.fail allows attackers to steal attestation keys, impersonate secure enclaves, decrypt traffic, and compromise sensitive data. The attack is relatively cheap and easy to execute, requiring readily available equipment. Services like BuilderNet, dstack, and Secret Network were demonstrated to be vulnerable.

The article concludes by discussing potential mitigations, such as adding entropy to ciphertext blocks and exploring more robust encryption methods, acknowledging the challenge of balancing performance and security in TEEs. It stresses the importance of understanding the limitations of TEEs, especially in environments where physical security cannot be guaranteed.
chinese_title: 新型攻击正在削弱英伟达、AMD和英特尔的安全区域防御。
chinese_summary:
本文重点介绍了英伟达、AMD和英特尔的可信执行环境（TEE）中的关键漏洞，这些漏洞破坏了它们提供的安全保证。一种名为"TEE.fail"的新攻击通过在内存芯片和主板之间物理插入硬件来绕过最新的TEE保护，只需要短暂的物理访问和内核操作系统妥协。这种攻击以及之前的Battering RAM和Wiretap等攻击，暴露了TEE在物理攻击面前的局限性，而芯片制造商通常将此类攻击排除在其威胁模型之外。

本文批评了芯片制造商和TEE用户（包括Cloudflare、Anthropic、微软、Meta和Signal等主要科技公司）的误导性营销，他们夸大了所提供的保护，往往暗示能够抵御物理攻击。研究人员HD Moore强调，客户很难理解他们在机密计算中获得的实际安全性。

这些攻击利用确定性加密，这是一种较弱的加密形式，容易受到重放攻击。"TEE.fail"允许攻击者窃取证明密钥、冒充安全飞地、解密流量并泄露敏感数据。该攻击相对便宜且易于执行，只需要现成的设备。BuilderNet、dstack和Secret Network等服务已被证明容易受到攻击。

文章最后讨论了潜在的缓解措施，例如向密文块添加熵以及探索更强大的加密方法，同时也承认了在TEE中平衡性能和安全性的挑战。文章强调了理解TEE局限性的重要性，尤其是在无法保证物理安全的环境中。

title: Win 11 videos demonstrating account requirements bypass purged from YouTube
summary:
YouTube removed videos from the CyberCPU Tech channel that demonstrated methods to bypass Windows 11's hardware and account requirements. The creator, Rich, suspects Microsoft is behind the takedown, though YouTube cited a violation of "Harmful or Dangerous Content" guidelines, which Rich finds illogical as bypassing Windows 11 limitations doesn't pose a physical risk.

Rich expressed frustration over the lack of clear communication from YouTube regarding the specific reasons for the removals, stating he feels forced to self-censor. He acknowledged that YouTube has the right to control its platform but desires transparency.

The article highlights the ongoing debate about Windows 11's stringent requirements, which are pushing some users to consider alternatives like Macs or, as suggested in the comments, Linux distributions like Bazzite. The removal of these videos coincides with Microsoft's push for Windows 10 users to upgrade, and these upgrades are proving difficult for many users because of the set requirements.

The article concludes by noting the uncertainty surrounding the takedown, suggesting possibilities ranging from YouTube's AI algorithm to a direct request from Microsoft. It also mentions that YouTube has recently penalized Gamers Nexus as well.
chinese_title: YouTube 清除了演示绕过 Win 11 账户要求的视频
chinese_summary:
YouTube删除了CyberCPU Tech频道演示绕过Windows 11硬件和账户要求的视频。创作者Rich怀疑微软是此次下架的幕后推手，尽管YouTube声称违反了“有害或危险内容”指南，Rich认为这不合逻辑，因为绕过Windows 11的限制不会造成人身危险。

Rich对YouTube缺乏关于删除的具体原因的明确沟通表示沮丧，并表示他感到被迫自我审查。他承认YouTube有权控制其平台，但希望获得透明度。

这篇文章强调了关于Windows 11严格要求的持续争论，这些要求正促使一些用户考虑其他选择，例如Mac电脑，或者像评论中建议的那样，使用像Bazzite这样的Linux发行版。这些视频的删除恰逢微软推动Windows 10用户升级之时，而由于设定的要求，这些升级对许多用户来说都很困难。

文章最后指出，下架事件仍存在不确定性，并提出了各种可能性，从YouTube的AI算法到微软的直接要求。文章还提到YouTube最近也惩罚了Gamers Nexus。

title: Wheeled Inverted Pendulum Model
summary:
This article introduces the Wheeled Inverted Pendulum (WIP) model, a nonlinear system consisting of a concentrated mass attached to a massless pole and active wheels. Unlike the cart-pole model with passive wheels, the WIP's wheels are actively driven. The article defines the system's parameters: pole length (ℓ), mass (m), pole angle (θ), and wheel position on the ground (r).

A key assumption is that the wheels roll without slipping, linking the wheel's angular coordinate (ϕ) to its ground position (r). The core of the article focuses on presenting the equation of motion for the WIP: ℓθ̈ = g sin(θ) - r̈ cos(θ). This equation describes the relationship between the pendulum's angular acceleration (θ̈), gravity (g), the angle (θ), and the wheel's linear acceleration (r̈).

The article highlights the relevance of this model for optimal control applications in real robots. It mentions the intention to discuss the linearization and discretization of the equation of motion for small angles, suggesting that this simplified form is more amenable to control design.

title: Wacl – A Tcl Distribution for WebAssembly
summary:
Wacl is a Tcl distribution designed for WebAssembly, allowing developers to embed a Tcl interpreter into web browsers and integrate it with JavaScript. This enables Tcl developers to build client-side web applications using their familiar tools and leverage existing Tcl codebases like Tcllib. Wacl builds upon the Emtcl project, adding features like a Tcl interpreter instance accessible via JavaScript, an event loop, client sockets (supporting binary communication via websockets), and a virtual filesystem for Tcl libraries and packages.

Key benefits include using Tcl for web development, reusing existing Tcl code in browsers, and potentially smaller application sizes and faster performance with WebAssembly compared to JavaScript.

Wacl includes extensions like `wacl` (for DOM manipulation and calling Javascript), `tDOM`, `json`, `html`, `javascript`, `ncgi`, and `rl_json`. While including extensions increases functionality, it also increases the download size, requiring a balance between features and bandwidth considerations.

The article directs the user to try a demo and download a precompiled version. It outlines the build process, requiring the Emscripten SDK and a Unix/Linux environment. The build generates WebAssembly (preferred) or JavaScript files. The article also provides guidance on resetting the build environment and recreating patches.
chinese_title: Wacl – 用于 WebAssembly 的 Tcl 发行版
chinese_summary:
Wacl是一个为WebAssembly设计的Tcl发行版，它允许开发者将Tcl解释器嵌入到Web浏览器中并与JavaScript集成。这使得Tcl开发者可以使用他们熟悉的工具构建客户端Web应用程序，并利用现有的Tcl代码库（如Tcllib）。Wacl构建于Emtcl项目之上，添加了诸如可通过JavaScript访问的Tcl解释器实例、事件循环、客户端套接字（支持通过websockets进行二进制通信）以及用于Tcl库和软件包的虚拟文件系统等功能。

主要优势包括使用Tcl进行Web开发、在浏览器中重用现有的Tcl代码，以及与JavaScript相比，WebAssembly可能带来更小的应用程序尺寸和更快的性能。

Wacl包含诸如`wacl`（用于DOM操作和调用Javascript）、`tDOM`、`json`、`html`、`javascript`、`ncgi`和`rl_json`等扩展。包含扩展可以增加功能，但也会增加下载大小，需要在功能和带宽考虑之间取得平衡。

文章引导用户尝试演示并下载预编译版本。它概述了构建过程，需要Emscripten SDK和Unix/Linux环境。构建会生成WebAssembly（首选）或JavaScript文件。文章还提供了关于重置构建环境和重新创建补丁的指导。

title: Powerful and precise multi-color lasers now fit on a single chip
summary:
Researchers at Columbia University, led by Michal Lipson, have developed a powerful and precise multi-color laser that fits on a single chip. This breakthrough involves creating a frequency comb, a special type of light with many orderly colors, on a compact silicon photonics chip. Traditionally, generating such frequency combs required large, expensive lasers and amplifiers.

The team utilized a multimode laser diode, known for its power but also its "messy" beam. They implemented a "locking mechanism" using silicon photonics to purify the laser's output, resulting in a clean, stable, and highly coherent beam. The chip's nonlinear optical properties then split this purified beam into dozens of evenly spaced colors, creating the frequency comb.

This innovation offers several advantages: it reduces the size, cost, and energy consumption compared to current systems that use racks of individual lasers. It also opens doors for faster and more energy-efficient data transmission.

The primary application is in data centers, where the demand for high-bandwidth light sources is growing due to the rise of artificial intelligence. These multi-wavelength combs enable wavelength-division multiplexing (WDM), allowing multiple data streams to travel through the same fiber simultaneously.

Beyond data centers, the chip has potential applications in portable spectrometers, ultra-precise optical clocks, compact quantum devices, and advanced LiDAR systems. The development represents a significant step toward bringing lab-grade light sources into practical, real-world devices.
chinese_title: Powerful and precise multi-color lasers now fit on a single chip
chinese_summary:
哥伦比亚大学研究人员在Michal Lipson的带领下，开发出一种强大的、精确的多色激光器，该激光器可安装在单个芯片上。这项突破涉及在紧凑的硅光子芯片上创建频率梳，这是一种具有许多有序颜色的特殊光。传统上，产生这种频率梳需要大型、昂贵的激光器和放大器。

该团队利用了多模激光二极管，这种二极管以其功率而闻名，但也以其“混乱”的光束而闻名。他们利用硅光子技术实现了一种“锁定机制”，以净化激光器的输出，从而产生干净、稳定且高度相干的光束。然后，芯片的非线性光学特性将这种纯化的光束分成数十种均匀间隔的颜色，从而创建了频率梳。

这项创新具有多项优势：与目前使用多个独立激光器的机架系统相比，它缩小了尺寸、降低了成本和能耗。它还为更快、更节能的数据传输打开了大门。

主要应用是在数据中心，由于人工智能的兴起，对高带宽光源的需求不断增长。这些多波长梳使波分复用 (WDM) 成为可能，从而允许多个数据流同时通过同一光纤传输。

除了数据中心之外，该芯片还在便携式光谱仪、超精密光钟、紧凑型量子设备和先进的LiDAR系统等方面具有潜在应用。这项开发代表着将实验室级光源引入实用、现实世界设备的重要一步。

title: HTTPS by default
summary:
In October 2026 (Chrome 154), Google Chrome will enable "Always Use Secure Connections" by default, prompting users for permission before accessing non-HTTPS public websites. This aims to combat navigation hijacking and protect users from malware and social engineering attacks stemming from insecure HTTP connections. While HTTPS adoption has significantly increased, plateauing at around 95-99%, the remaining HTTP connections pose a risk.

The default setting will apply only to public sites to reduce user disruption, as securing private sites (e.g., local IP addresses) with HTTPS certificates is more complex. A prior experiment with a subset of users showed that the setting keeps users safer without excessive warnings, with the median user seeing fewer than one warning per week. Google is working with organizations still using HTTP to migrate to HTTPS before the change.

Chrome's "Always Use Secure Connections" setting, in its public-sites variant, will be enabled for users with Enhanced Safe Browsing in April 2026. Users can disable the warnings if desired. Google encourages website developers and IT professionals to enable the setting now to identify sites needing migration and consult resources to understand and mitigate potential warnings.

Future efforts will focus on reducing barriers to HTTPS adoption, particularly for local network sites, paving the way for even stronger HTTP protections.
chinese_title: 默认HTTPS
chinese_summary:
2026年10月（Chrome 154），谷歌Chrome浏览器将默认启用“始终使用安全连接”功能，在访问非HTTPS公共网站之前会提示用户授权。此举旨在打击导航劫持，保护用户免受源于不安全HTTP连接的恶意软件和社交工程攻击。尽管HTTPS的普及率已显著提高，稳定在95-99%左右，但剩余的HTTP连接仍然存在风险。

默认设置仅适用于公共网站，以减少对用户的干扰，因为使用HTTPS证书保护私有网站（例如，本地IP地址）更为复杂。之前对一部分用户进行的实验表明，该设置能够更有效地保护用户安全，且不会产生过多警告，中位数用户每周看到的警告少于一次。谷歌正在与仍在使用HTTP的组织合作，以便在更改之前迁移到HTTPS。

Chrome的“始终使用安全连接”设置（公共网站变体）将于2026年4月为启用增强型安全浏览的用户启用。用户可以根据需要禁用警告。谷歌鼓励网站开发者和IT专业人员现在启用该设置，以识别需要迁移的网站，并查阅资源来理解和缓解潜在的警告。

未来的工作将侧重于减少HTTPS普及的障碍，特别是对于本地网络站点，从而为更强大的HTTP保护铺平道路。

title: Keeping the Internet fast and secure: introducing Merkle Tree Certificates
summary:
This article discusses the challenge of transitioning the Internet's Web Public-Key Infrastructure (WebPKI) to post-quantum (PQ) cryptography to mitigate the threat of quantum computers breaking current cryptographic methods. While PQ algorithms exist, their significantly larger signature and public key sizes pose a performance problem for TLS handshakes, potentially degrading performance before quantum computers pose an immediate threat.

To address this, Cloudflare proposes Merkle Tree Certificates (MTCs) as a solution to redesign the WebPKI for a smooth transition to PQ authentication without performance impact. MTCs aim to minimize the number of public keys and signatures in TLS handshakes.

The article explains the current WebPKI's reliance on multiple signatures and public keys due to certificate chains and Certificate Transparency (CT) requirements. MTCs streamline this by allowing client validation information to be disseminated out-of-band. A client with up-to-date information only needs one signature, one public key, and a Merkle tree inclusion proof during the TLS handshake. This is achieved by having Certification Authorities (CAs) generate signatureless certificates in batches and use Merkle trees to prove inclusion of a certificate in a signed batch.

Cloudflare announces an experimental deployment of MTCs in collaboration with Chrome Security to test its effectiveness and safety. The experiment seeks to demonstrate that MTCs can enable the adoption of PQ certificates without sacrificing performance.

chinese_summary:
